    0.1

    Represent the main entry of this bukkit api, give access to each manager

    Author:
    Valentin Burgaud (Xharos), <xharos@islandswars.fr>, Valentin Chassignol (Vinetos), <vinetos@islandswars.fr> Created the 24/09/2017 at 11:52
